reviewText: This is from the Bell Series of over 50 years ago and the best teacher about math, the sun, blood, etc I have ever found. My grandkids are using this to really learn and understand the subjects far more than CORE ever will come close.
Great old movie, I show parts of this video in my science class, It shows many changes in how teaching about the sun is presented since 1958.

A blast from the past directed by Frank Capra, with Eddie Albert and Lionel Barrymore in his last role as Father Time. Educational on several levels. Almost mystical in parts. Well worth watching, especially with children. I recommend an aperitif bowl prior for the full import to be understood.
